actor.caption: Actor
actor.description: The actor that performed the operation or the action.

-1.caption: Other
-1.description: The event severity is not mapped. See the severity attribute, which contains a data source specific value.

0.description: The event severity is not known.

-1.caption: Other
-1.description: The event activity is not mapped.

device.caption: Device
device.description: The device that reported the event.

data.description: Additional data that is associated with the event.
data.caption: Data

-1.caption: Other
-1.description: The event status is not mapped. See the status attribute, which contains a data source specific value.

confidence.caption: Confidence
confidence.description: The confidence of the reported event severity as a percentage: 0%-100%.
